mapper.select: SELECT fc.feed_comment_id AS feedCommentId, fc.feed_id AS feedId, fc.user_id AS userId, u.nick_name AS nickName, fc.comment AS comment, fc.created_at AS createAt FROM feed_comment fc INNER JOIN user u ON fc.user_id = u.user_id WHERE fc.feed_id = #{feedId} ORDER BY fc. feed_comment_id LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
